heading: E-commerce Website for Fashion Retailer
paragraph: Built a modern, responsive e-commerce platform that increased online sales by 150% and improved user experience.
extraParagraphs: Implemented secure payment processing and inventory management system.
Designed intuitive navigation and mobile-optimized checkout process.
Integrated analytics to track customer behavior and optimize conversions.

heading: Corporate Website Redesign
paragraph: Redesigned a corporate website with modern aesthetics and improved functionality, resulting in 40% increase in lead generation.
extraParagraphs: Created a responsive design that works seamlessly across all devices.
Implemented SEO best practices to improve search engine rankings.
Added content management system for easy updates and maintenance.

heading: Restaurant Web Application
paragraph: Developed a comprehensive web application for restaurant management with online ordering and reservation system.
extraParagraphs: Built custom online ordering system with real-time order tracking.
Integrated table reservation system with automated confirmations.
Created admin dashboard for menu management and analytics.

heading: Healthcare Portal Development
paragraph: Created a secure patient portal for healthcare providers with appointment scheduling and medical records access.
extraParagraphs: Implemented HIPAA-compliant security measures for patient data protection.
Developed user-friendly interface for patients and healthcare providers.
Integrated with existing medical systems for seamless data synchronization.

heading: Educational Platform
paragraph: Built an interactive learning platform with course management and student progress tracking features.
extraParagraphs: Created multimedia content delivery system for engaging learning experience.
Implemented student progress tracking and certificate generation.
Developed responsive design for learning on any device.

heading: Real Estate Web Platform
paragraph: Developed a comprehensive real estate platform with property listings, virtual tours, and lead management.
extraParagraphs: Integrated property search with advanced filtering and map integration.
Created virtual tour functionality using 360-degree photography.
Built CRM system for managing leads and client communications.
